title: New Blog
html:
Welcome to my blog! I hope that I impressed you with the feels of my personal website. I didn't modify much the Sapper template I scaffolded this website from, yes. But the font, color combination... You've never seen anything like this.

On serious note, I'm really happy with my new blog. I will fill up this space with elaboration of my thought on issues, my projects, and maybe explanation of concepts. That sounds ambitious, but it is what I am aiming for.

The fact that this blog lacks comment section doesn't mean I am not open to interactions. I appreciate your time visiting my blog and welcome any kind of feedback. DM me on twitter where I am @rezahandzalah.
